uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple manager for publish/subscribe events (a flavour of the Observer design pattern). Published events can also optionally be logged to a special events logger which allows, for example, a 'narrative' type file of real-world-domain- meaningful events to be kept
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Stuart Rossiter
